section.earlyAccessTitle: Lock In Your Early Access — Limited Spots!

modal.successMessage: Thank you for joining the challenge!

challenger.step1Desc: Browse challenges by location, difficulty, and prize pool. Find your perfect thrill.
challenger.step2Desc: Reserve your spot and show up ready to dominate. Bring your A-game.
challenger.step3Desc: Claim your prizes and share your victory. Build your reputation as a champion.

vendor.step1Desc: Let our ambassador host a 1-hour challenge event at your venue.
vendor.step2Desc: Negotiate your cut on bookings. Keep all in-venue spending.
vendor.step3Desc: Paying customers, and boost your visibility.

ambassador.step1Desc: Get permission from a local venue to host events.
ambassador.step2Desc: Choose the price, structure, and prize.
ambassador.step3Desc: Run events, keep up to 80% of  revenue.

heroCarousel.challengerHeadline: Dare to Dominate. Book Challenges. Win Prizes.
heroCarousel.challengerSubhead: Join the waitlist and get 10% off your first adventure.
heroCarousel.vendorHeadline: Turn ur business into a gold mine. Host unforgettable challenges
heroCarousel.vendorSubhead: Apply now with zero upfront cost.
heroCarousel.ambassadorHeadline: Want to host challenge events in your own venue? Set your price, earn more, and grow your ChallenZee brand locally!
heroCarousel.ambassadorSubhead: We have your back: promoting your events to millions, ticketing & booking system. You run the show.

reasons.title: No More FOMO
reasons.desc: Never miss out on the hottest challenges in your city. Be first to know, first to compete.

reasons.title: Digital Bragging Rights
reasons.desc: Share your wins across all platforms. Build your personal brand as a champion.

reasons.title: Connect & Conquer
reasons.desc: Meet like-minded thrill-seekers. Form teams, make friends, create memories.

reasons.title: Win Real Prizes
reasons.desc: Cash, gadgets, experiences, and exclusive merchandise. Every challenge has rewards.

benefits.title: Competition
benefits.desc: Push your limits and discover what you're truly capable of achieving based on ur own interest.

benefits.title: Connection
benefits.desc: Build lasting friendships with people who share your passion for adventure.

benefits.title: Rewards
benefits.desc: win prizes, discounts, and exclusive access to premium challenges.

benefits.title: Memories
benefits.desc: Create unforgettable experiences that you'll be talking about for years.

about.heroText: ChallenZee is a next-gen platform that turns real-world venues into epic arenas of fun, competition, and community.
about.heroPlayersIntro: We connect three key players in the challenge movement:
about.heroBulletChallengers: Challengers: Join unique, gamified events to compete, win prizes, and climb the city leaderboard. Become your city’s ChallenZee King.
about.heroBulletAmbassadors: Ambassadors: Curate and host your own challenge events. Set your price, get full support, and build your brand as a local entertainment leader.
about.heroBulletVenues: Business Venues: Open your doors to unforgettable experiences. We bring the events, people, and visibility — you earn from bookings and spending.
about.heroNetwork: Together, we’re building a global network of challenge-driven events where everyone levels up
about.heroQuote: “ don't just take part ! You're here to take over ! ”

members.name: Ghassen Mansouri
members.role: Founder, CEO & Head of Market Development
members.description: Visionary founder and strategist behind ChallenZee. Ghassen is the driving force who conceptualized the mission, product vision, and go-to-market roadmap. A seasoned expert in rapport building, business development, and market penetration, he brings sharp executional instinct, multilingual versatility, and a deep passion for connecting youth with dynamic social experiences. His cross-industry background in SaaS, luxury tourism, and promotional sales shapes ChallenZee's agile and growth-driven strategy.

members.name: Nabil Mansouri
members.description: Visionary executive with 15+ years of experience scaling digital ventures across construction, transport, healthtech, and telecom. Expert in strategic partnerships, P&L, and international growth.

members.name: Kardo Sharifi
members.description: Mentor to over 100 startups. Specialist in product-market fit, agile delivery, and cross-functional team scaling. Supports ChallenZee's roadmap and operational effectiveness.

members.name: Rami Ben Ahmed
members.description: Oversees development and product implementation, working closely with engineering to shape a user-centric platform experience.

members.name: Yassine Mrabet
members.description: Part of the core product development team. Focuses on front-end/back-end synergy for ChallenZee's scalable MVP.

members.name: Chams Eddine Abderrahim
members.description: Ensures cloud infrastructure, performance, and stability as the platform scales. Supports automation and DevOps workflows.

members.name: Mohamed Achref Mannai
members.description: Storage Support Engineer with expertise in SAN environments, backup systems, and VMware architecture, working alongside the development team to ensure ChallenZee’s platform infrastructure is performant, secure, and scalable

members.name: Amanda Martinez
members.description: Specialist in crafting vibrant brand visuals and digital experiences. Shapes ChallenZee's look and feel with deep insight into Gen Z appeal.

members.name: Alessia Nikolli
members.description: Multilingual marketing graduate with real-world campaign and research experience. Coordinates content creation, communications, and social impact messaging.

members.name: Ottavia Oddone
members.role: Content Creator & Gen Z Community Voice
members.description: Social psychology enthusiast, event host, and podcast creator. Brings authentic storytelling and Gen Z insight to the brand's online voice.

members.name: Mitri Tessera
members.description: Concert organizer & digital strategist. Leads ChallenZee's early-stage activations and challenge event curation in Milan.

members.name: Giorgia Casti
members.description: Marketing specialist and travel content creator. Brings creative flair and digital reach to ChallenZee events in Torino.

members.name: Maria Milagaros
members.description: Hospitality insider with experience across tourism venues. Promotes and supports event execution.

members.name: Vito
members.description: Party promoter with extensive event execution experience. Expert in university, club, and social group activations.

members.name: Luka Devic
members.description: Drives youth engagement and challenge experience promotion within international circles.

members.name: Amin Rezazade
members.description: DJ and party organizer with a deep network in nightlife venues. Leads event curation and atmosphere creation.

members.name: Amin Ben
members.description: Experienced in staff and team leadership, market expansion, and onboarding new partners, clients, and customers. Adept at driving business growth through strategic relationship-building and innovative market development initiatives.

waitlist.title: Join the Waitlist!
